name: The Shipyard Inc.
description:
Builders of digital and analog things that yield our clients more revenue, growth, and customers.
Builders in the only culture where you'll find brilliant creatives talking metrics with account strategists, right next to innovative technologists brainstorming with telephonic reps all for a singular purpose.
We never stop moving, searching, asking, discovering, inventing, learning, creating and generating. And we never stop shipping while most other companies, well, they just never stop talking.
READ MORE...
